law.catch_line: Duty of permittee in event of fire.

text.section:
Sec. 11B-13. Duty of permittee in event of fire.
In the event that a fire should occur on the dump or land fill site, the permittee of the dump or land fill site shall first immediately notify the Dade County Fire Department and shall thereafter take all necessary measures to extinguish the fire by use of the equipment required by of this chapter and whatever other equipment may be available.
